description: With an athletic design focusing on fit and fabric performance, the Motus delivers advanced performance for trail runs and demanding hikes. Its superlight Phasic™ FL bi-component fabric delivers exceptional moisture management, and anatomical patterning, a trim fit and stretch help the Motus move with your body while keeping the fibres close to the skin to maximize wicking performance. Flatlock seams reduce potential irritation, and reflective blades increase visibility in low light
name: Arcteryx Motus SL Crew SS - Mens
